title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot access their account.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Card keeps getting declined during checkout despite having enough balance.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer reports they are not receiving password reset emails.

title: Account Locked After Failed Attempts
description: Customer's account is locked after too many failed login attempts.

title: 2FA Code Not Working
description: Two-Factor Authentication code not accepted. Issue fixed by resyncing device.

title: Unable to Update Profile Info
description: Customer cannot change their profile information due to a system error.

title: Subscription Not Activated
description: Customer purchased a subscription but it still shows as inactive.

title: App Crashing on Dashboard
description: App crashes immediately when user opens the dashboard.

title: Order History Not Loading
description: Customer cannot view their order history; page keeps loading.

title: Slow Website Loading
description: Website was loading very slowly. Issue resolved after server optimization.
